amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would harm rural hospitals and health care providers.

action.text: Amendment SA 64 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 64 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 10.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 64.
Amendment SA 64 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Manchin.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 64 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 10.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 64 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Manchin.
